definition: Campaign to Defend the Republic (1915) or National Protection War, a rebellion against the installation of Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯[Yuan2 Shi4 kai3] as emperor
May Fourth Movement/Chinese national renewal movement that started with 4th May 1919 protest against the Treaty of Versailles
pinyin: wu3 si4 ai4 guo2 yun4 dong4

definition: National Games, Chinese athletics competition, organized every four years since 1959

sentences.english: Conrad later appeared in an American Express advert of famous Americans nobody recognised.
sentences.chinese: 康拉德後來現身於美國運通公司的廣告中。

sentences.english: He led them in launching a patriotic movement.
sentences.chinese: 他領導他們開展了一場愛國運動。

sentences.english: He pays by apex or with his amex card .
sentences.chinese: 他是用美國運通公司的信用卡付賬的。

sentences.english: The British General Gordon helped the Manchu Govt put down the Taiping Rebellion.
sentences.chinese: 英國的戈登將軍幫助滿洲政府鎮壓太平天國運動。

sentences.english: The Chinese character system was in existence in the Qin Dynasty(221-206B.
sentences.chinese: 文獻和考古資料證實秦王朝國運雖短，但有文字制度。

sentences.english: In addition, the turmoil of the nation put him in deep anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 另外國運動盪邊境不安又讓他深爲焦慮。

sentences.english: The stuff you use was floated over from China on made in China ships.
sentences.chinese: 你用的原料是由中國製造的船從中國運來的。

sentences.english: National fortune relies on education, and education depends on creation.
sentences.chinese: 國運興衰繫於教育，教育振興依靠創新。

sentences.english: The education is the first and last word in building up a country.
sentences.chinese: 教育是立國之本，關乎國運興衰。

sentences.english: I'd like to inquire about a shipment of silk coming from China.
sentences.chinese: 我想查詢一下從中國運來的一批絲綢。

sentences.english: Can I charge that to my American Express card?
sentences.chinese: 可以記在美國運通公司信用卡上嗎？

sentences.english: The law of the Tang Dynasty have been made a distinction between the crime on the destiny of country and on the fate of people.
sentences.chinese: 唐律將其區分爲涉及國運休咎和人命休咎兩大方面。

sentences.english: This influenced the country and world greatly.
sentences.chinese: 此事影響國運及世局及大。

sentences.english: Patriotic student movement in Beijing the impact of rapid expansion.
sentences.chinese: 北京學生愛國運動的影響迅速擴大。

sentences.english: In the present organization of the Olympics there is far too much that encourages aggressive patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 似乎時下奧運組織更偏向於宣揚激烈的愛國運動精神。

sentences.english: This refers to the anti-imperialist patriotic movement on May 30, 1925.
sentences.chinese: 指一九二五年五月三十日爆發的反帝愛國運動。

definition: the country prospers, the people at peace (idiom); peace and prosperity
favorable weather (idiom); good weather for crops
to live in peace and work happily (idiom)
to take it up a notch/to bring it up a level
prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
to start a war/to make war/to battle against
